name: You are over the daily limit for sending tweets

content.html: I'm *extremely* lucky to have learned this watching around 5 rounds of hiring/firing/departures in my first job, without being directly affected by them. always do what's right for you. your employer will always do that, no matter what they say - you should too.
content.value:
I'm *extremely* lucky to have learned this watching around 5 rounds of hiring/firing/departures in my first job, without being directly affected by them.

always do what's right for you. your employer will always do that, no matter what they say - you should too.
